checksum.description: the md5 checksum of the original file for easier verification

crypto_chain_uri.description: the ID of the chain to use in URI format. e.g. "ethereum://42/<tokenaddress>"

crypto_transaction_id.description: the transaction in which the payment happened

id.description: identifying this payment. could be a sequential number, could be a transaction hash of the crypto payment

reference.description: payment reference (e.g. reference field on bank transfer)

key.title: this is the sha256 hash of the label of the attribute, is not allowed to be updated by the client

owner.title: read owner from Ethereum and empty when used in POST/PUT

token_index.title: index of the token in the registry

entityEntityData.title: EntityData is the default entity schema

predefined.title: fields for bank accounts and ethereum wallets

entity_identifier.title: identifier of Entity whose data can be accessed via this relationship

funFundingData.title: FundingData is the default funding extension schema

checksum.title: the md5 checksum of the original file for easier verification - optional

id.title: identifying this payment. could be a sequential number, could be a transaction hash of the crypto payment

reference.title: payment reference (e.g. reference field on bank transfer)

crypto_chain_uri.title: the ID of the chain to use in URI format. e.g. "ethereum://42/<tokenaddress>"

crypto_transaction_id.title: the transaction in which the payment happened

sender_street1.title: street and address details of the sender company

sender_country.title: country ISO code of the sender of this invoice

invInvoiceData.title: InvoiceData is the default invoice schema

total_amount.title: the total amount of the line item

deposit_address.title: Deposit address for NFT Token created

message.title: message associated to status, if error, error message enclosed

account_id.title: account_id is the account associated to webhook

from_id.title: from_id if provided, original trigger of the event

to_id.title: to_id if provided, final destination of the event

notificationNotificationMessage.title: NotificationMessage wraps a single document to be notified to upstream services

reference_document_id.description: depending on status delivery note, invoice, ...

reference_document_item.title: line item from the reference document

number.title: purchase order number or reference number
